T02D2639:238b-1: sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ne sam kshibta n'a ma /
T02D2639:238b-3: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa /
T02D2639:238b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2639:238b-5: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2639:238b-6: chos kyi 'khor lo skor mdzad pa'i //
T02D2639:238b-8: dan song thams cad sbyong don du //
T02D2639:238b-9: lung gzhan cung zad bshad par bya //
T02D2639:238b-10: de la dang por rnal 'byor pa'i dbang phyug gis
T02D2639:238b-11: mi phyed bzhi rigs rnams gson pa'i bar chad du
T02D2639:238b-12: gyur pa'i dus su rdo rje'i rigs can rnams 'chi
T02D2639:238b-14: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i cho ga
T02D2639:238b-15: byed par 'dod pas ro dang nye ba'i gnas su
T02D2639:238b-16: stan la skyil mo krung bcas pas 'dug ste /
T02D2639:238b-17: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D2639:238b-19: de'i rjes la mgrin par yi ge hr'i: yongs su gyur pa las padma /
T02D2639:238b-20: de'i steng du aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2639:238b-21: 'khor la h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje rnam par
T02D2639:238b-22: bsgom ste / rdo rje lce rnam par bsams pas
T02D2639:238b-23: sdags [*sngags] bzlas pa mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro
T02D2639:238b-24: bsgom ste / // lag pa gnyis gan rkyal du
T02D2639:238b-25: byas pa'i lag pa'i mthil du aa las byung ba'i
T02D2639:239a-1: h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa kha dog dkar
T02D2639:239a-2: por sprul te lag pa'i mthil du thim par bsgoms
T02D2639:239a-3: la / lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba bcings la /
T02D2639:239a-4: rdo rje lag par rdo rje'i bar du sbyor bas
T02D2639:239a-5: phyag rgya bcing ba mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro
T02D2639:239a-6: // de nas lci ba ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa'i tshad du byugs la /
T02D2639:239a-7: tsandan dkar pos kyang byugs te ku shas chu dang ba'i rnam pa lnga gtor bar bya'o //
T02D2639:239a-8: 'bru lnga dang sman lnga dang rin po che lnga
T02D2639:239a-9: nang du blugs pa mgrin pa gos sngon pos bcings
T02D2639:239a-10: pa'i bum pa ku sha la nye bar gzhag par
T02D2639:239a-11: bya'o // rdo rje 'jigs byed nas bzung ste rdo
T02D2639:239a-12: rje rtse mo mthar thug pa'i phyag rgyas srung ba'i
T02D2639:239a-13: 'khor lo rnam par bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2639:239a-14: ra ba dang gur bcing ba bsgoms la byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2639:239a-15: dkyil 'khor la me tog gi tshom bu sil ma gtor la /
T02D2639:239a-16: 'khor lo tshogs dang bcas pa yi //
T02D2639:239a-17: dkyil 'khor nam mkhar bsgom par bya //
T02D2639:239a-18: me tog sogs kyis yang dag mchod //
T02D2639:239a-19: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya //
T02D2639:239a-20: lha dang min dri za dang //
T02D2639:239a-22: gnod sbyin srin po yi dags kyis //
T02D2639:239a-23: nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2639:239a-24: mchod nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni //
T02D2639:239a-25: yon tan brjod pa bsgom bya ste //
T02D2639:239a-26: ae ma ho sangs rgyas ae sangs rgyas //
T02D2639:239a-27: sangs rgyas mdzad pa mchog mdzad legs //
T02D2639:239a-28: ngan song thams cad legs sbyangs nas //
T02D2639:239a-29: 'gro rnams byang chub thob par mdzad //
T02D2639:239a-30: lha dang klu sogs thams cad kyis //
T02D2639:239a-31: thal mo rab tu sbyar byas te //
T02D2639:239a-33: de nyid du ni mi snang 'gyur //
T02D2639:239a-34: de rjes yi ge aa las ni //
T02D2639:239a-35: bskyed pa'i zla ba snying gar te //
T02D2639:239a-36: de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02D2639:239a-37: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bkug nas ni //
T02D2639:239a-38: snying ga ru ni gzhug par bya //
T02D2639:239a-39: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs kyis ;
T02D2639:239a-40: / dgug gzhug bcings la dbang du bya //
T02D2639:239a-41: dkyil 'khor rnam gnyis legs bsres te //
T02D2639:239a-42: ro gcig tu ni rnam par bsgom //
T02D2639:239a-43: dkyil 'khor ba ni thams cad du //
T02D2639:239a-44: rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba //
T02D2639:239a-45: de yi dbus su bdag gi dngos //
T02D2639:239a-46: sh'akya seng ger bsgom par bya //
T02D2639:239b-0: de nas sh'akya @239b thub pa'i thugs kar zla ba'i
T02D2639:239b-1: dkyil 'khor la ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags kha dog
T02D2639:239b-3: sngags kyi 'od zer rnams kyis khams gsum po snang
T02D2639:239b-4: bar byas nas dmyal ba dang yi dags dang byol
T02D2639:239b-5: song gi sems can ngan song ba rnams 'od zer
T02D2639:239b-6: gyis bkug par bltas la dkyil 'khor du bcug pa
T02D2639:239b-7: dang / dkyil 'khor pa thams cad kyis de nas
T02D2639:239b-8: sems can thams cad la dbang bskur ba dang ldan
T02D2639:239b-10: de ltar dbang bskur tsam gyis ni //
T02D2639:239b-11: khams gsum pa yi sems can kun //
T02D2639:239b-12: sangs rgyas sras dang mnyam bkod nas //
T02D2639:239b-13: dri ma med pa'i khyad par gyis //
T02D2639:239b-14: de nas sems can dga' ba yis //
T02D2639:239b-15: bstod pa'i tshig rnams rjod par byed //
T02D2639:239b-16: chos kyi 'khor lo skor mdzad pa //
T02D2639:239b-17: khams gsum pa yi 'gro kun gyi //
T02D2639:239b-18: ngan song thams cad sbyong mdzad pa //
T02D2639:239b-20: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las //
T02D2639:239b-21: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2639:239b-22: rang gi de nyid ston mdzad pa //
T02D2639:239b-23: rdo rje gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2639:239b-24: mnyam pa'i ye shes sgom pa yis //
T02D2639:239b-25: khams gsum la gnas thams cad la //
T02D2639:239b-26: dbang bskur rab tu stsol mdzad pa //
T02D2639:239b-27: rin chen gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2639:239b-28: so sor kun rtog rang bzhin las //
T02D2639:239b-29: chos kyi bdud rtsi char 'bebs pa //
T02D2639:239b-30: sems can dbugs 'byin mdzad pa po //
T02D2639:239b-32: sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2639:239b-33: bya ba rjes grub rang bzhin can //
T02D2639:239b-34: phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa po //
T02D2639:239b-35: sna tshogs gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02D2639:239b-36: / khams gsum 'od kyis gsal mdzad nas //
T02D2639:239b-37: sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas //
T02D2639:239b-38: bden pa mthong bar mdzad pa po //
T02D2639:239b-39: gtsug tor gzi brjid phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2639:239b-40: yid bzhin nor bu rgyal mtshan rnams //
T02D2639:239b-41: sbyin pas sems can thams cad kyi //
T02D2639:239b-42: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa //
T02D2639:239b-43: gtsug tor rgyal mtshan phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2639:239b-44: nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag / gcod cing bdud bzhi'i stobs bcom nas //
T02D2639:239b-45: sems can byang chub thob mdzad pa //
T02D2639:239b-46: gtsug tor gnon po phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2639:240a-2: / gdugs dkar gyis ni brgyan pa yi //
T02D2639:240a-3: chos kyi rgyal po thob mdzad pa //
T02D2639:240a-4: gtsug tor gdugs dkar phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2639:240a-5: sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin du //
T02D2639:240a-6: gang ma lha mo bzhi po dang //
T02D2639:240a-7: spos dang me tog mar me ma //
T02D2639:240a-8: dri yi lha mo phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2639:240a-9: dad sogs ngo bo las byung ba'i //
T02D2639:240a-10: sge yi dbus na gang bzhugs pa //
T02D2639:240a-11: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril //
T02D2639:240a-13: sgo bzhi yi ni logs dag na //
T02D2639:240a-14: khyams la sogs par bzhugs mdzad cing //
T02D2639:240a-15: rab dga' la sogs gnas mdzad gang //
T02D2639:240a-17: tshangs pa drag po zla ba sogs //
T02D2639:240a-18: phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba dang //
T02D2639:240a-19: me dang srin po rlung lha dang //
T02D2639:240a-21: ces bya ba'i tshig 'dis bstod cid [*cing?] dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D2639:240a-22: spros nas dkyil 'khor la sogs pa ste khams gsum po stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2639:240a-23: de nas stong pa nyid las yam ram bam lam las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
T02D2639:240a-24: sum las byung ba'i rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can gyi ri rab bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2639:240a-25: de'i dbus su bhr'um las byung ba'i gzhal yas khang
T02D2639:240a-26: gru bzhi la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o
T02D2639:240a-27: // de'i dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa /
T02D2639:240a-28: de'i lte ba la gnas pa'i seng ge'i gdan no //
T02D2639:240a-29: de'i steng du aa las byung ba'i zla ba la
T02D2639:240a-30: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can gyi sngags
T02D2639:240a-31: bzlas te / aom mu ne mu ne ma h'a mu ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2639:240a-32: sngags 'di'i yongs su gyur pa las //
T02D2639:240a-33: sh'akya'i rgyal po rjes dran bya //
T02D2639:240a-34: sems can kun la rjes brtse bas //
T02D2639:240a-36: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te //
T02D2639:240a-37: rim gyis rnam par 'byed pa ni //
T02D2639:240a-39: 'khor ba thams cad gcod byed yin //
T02D2639:240a-41: ji ltar padma la chags pa'i //
T02D2639:240a-42: bung ba la sogs bsdams pa bzhin //
T02D2639:240a-44: bcing pa'i sdug bsngal thar par byed //
T02D2639:240a-45: de bzhin 'khor bar sems can rnams //
T02D2639:240a-46: srid gsum 'khor bar bcings pa las //
T02D2639:240b-0: thugs @240b rje'i bdag can sh'akya yi //
T02D2639:240b-1: seng ges bcings pa las grol mdzad //
T02D2639:240b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zla ba la sngags kyi yi ge bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2639:240b-3: aom na mo bha ga wa te sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ni r'a j'a ya /
T02D2639:240b-8: aom sho dha ne sho dha ne sarba p'a pam bi sho dha na shuddhe bi shuddhe /
T02D2639:240b-9: sarba karma a'a bar na bi sho dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02D2639:240b-10: sngags 'dis rdo rje gtsug tor nas bzung nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i bar du rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D2639:240b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas phyung ste
T02D2639:240b-14: sems can thams cad snang bar byas nas ngan song
T02D2639:240b-15: thams cad zhi bar byas te shar gyi rtsibs kyi
T02D2639:240b-16: padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i h'um las skyes
T02D2639:240b-17: pa'i rdo rje gtsug tor sku mdog dkar po sa
T02D2639:240b-18: gnon gyi phyag rgyas yang dag par bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2639:240b-19: aom ratnot ta ma tr'am gis lho'i rtsibs kyi padma
T02D2639:240b-20: dang zla ba la gnas pa'i rin chen gtsug tor
T02D2639:240b-21: sku mdog sngon po mchog spyin gyi phyag rgya 'dzin
T02D2639:240b-22: pa khams gsum pa la dbang skur bar mdzad pa'o
T02D2639:240b-23: // aom padmo ta ta ma hr'i: sa nub kyi
T02D2639:240b-24: rtsibs kyi padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i padma'i
T02D2639:240b-25: gtsug tor sku mdog dmar po bsam gtan gyi phyag
T02D2639:240b-26: // rgya 'dzin pa / sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2639:240b-27: aom bi sho dha ma aa zhes pas byang gi
T02D2639:240b-28: rtsibs kyi padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i sna
T02D2639:240b-29: tshogs gtsug tor sku mdog ljang gu mi 'jigs pa
T02D2639:240b-30: stsol bas sems can 'khor ba las sgrol bar mdzad
T02D2639:240b-31: pa'o // aom gyi sa bon las byung ba'i gtsug
T02D2639:240b-32: tor gzi brjid me'i mtshams kyi pang dang zla ba
T02D2639:240b-33: pa'o // la gnas pa / sku mdog dkar dmar
T02D2639:240b-34: phyag g-yas na nyi ma bsnams pa g-yon dkur brten
T02D2639:240b-35: te bzhugs pa khams gsum pa snang bar mdzad pa'o
T02D2639:240b-36: pa'o // la gnas pa / // h'um gi sa
T02D2639:240b-37: bon las byung ba'i gtsug tor rgyal mtshan bden bral
T02D2639:240b-38: kyi rtsibs kyi padma dang zla ba la gnas pa
T02D2639:240b-39: sku mdog dmar nag yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal
T02D2639:240b-40: mtshan bsnams pa ser sna sbyong bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D2639:240b-41: dhi'i sa bon las byung ba'i gtsug tor rnon po
T02D2639:240b-42: rlung gi rtsibs kyi padma dang zla ba la gnas
T02D2639:240b-43: pa sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sngo ba /
T02D2639:241a-0: phyag g-yas na ral gri g-yon na glegs bam bsnams pa nyon mongs @241a * //
T02D2639:241a-1: pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang dag par gcod par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2639:241a-2: ksham gi sa bon las byung ba gtsug tor gdugs
T02D2639:241a-3: dkar po dbang ldan gyi rtsibs kyi padma dang zla
T02D2639:241a-4: ba la gnas pa sku na dog dkar po gdugs
T02D2639:241a-5: bsnams pa chos kyi bdag po thob par mdzad pa'o
T02D2639:241a-6: // h'um tr'am hr'i:aa:'i sngags kyis sgeg mo la sogs
T02D2639:241a-7: pa bzhi mtshams kyi cha'i padma dang zla ba la
T02D2639:241a-8: gnas pa sku mdog rigs kyi rim pa bzhin no
T02D2639:241a-9: // // me tog la sogs pa grva'i cha'i padma
T02D2639:241a-10: dang zla ba la gnas pa sku mdog dang sngags
T02D2639:241a-11: de bzhin du spro bar bya'o //
T02D2639:241a-12: de nas aom sarba sam sk'a ra pa ri shuddhe
T02D2639:241a-13: dharma te ga ga na sa mudga te sva bh'a
T02D2639:241a-14: wa bi shuddhe ma h'a na y'a pa ri b'a
T02D2639:241a-15: re sv'a h'a / zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis byams
T02D2639:241a-16: pa la sogs pa bcu drug spro bar bya ste
T02D2639:241a-17: shar gyi sgo'i logs gnyis su byams pa la sogs
T02D2639:241a-19: byams pa mdog ser po padma la gnas pa'i zla
T02D2639:241a-20: ba la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa
T02D2639:241a-21: phyag g-yas na klu shing me tog / g-yon na
T02D2639:241a-22: ril pa spyi blugs 'dzin pa byams pa'i thugs kyi
T02D2639:241a-24: gnyis pa mthod [*mthong] ba don yod ni mdog ser
T02D2639:241a-25: po padma la gnas pa'i zla ba la bzhugs pa
T02D2639:241a-26: g-yas pa na padma spyan dang ldan pa /
T02D2639:241a-27: g-yon pa khu tshur dkur brten pa'o //
T02D2639:241a-28: gsum pa ngan song sbyong ba ni sku mdog dmar po lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2639:241a-29: bzhi pa mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms
T02D2639:241a-30: pa'i blo gros ni mdog dmar ser g-yas na dbyug
T02D2639:241a-31: pa 'dzin pa / g-yon pa khu tshur dkur brten pa'o //
T02D2639:241a-32: lho'i sgo'i logs su dang po spos kyi glang po mdog dkar ljang phyag g-yas na dri'i glang po'o //
T02D2639:241a-33: gnyis pa dpa' bar 'gro ba ni shel dang zla ba'i mdog can g-yas na ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2639:241a-34: gsum pa nam mkha'i mdzod ni mdog dkar ser g-yas
T02D2639:241a-35: pa na padma la gnas pa'i chos kyi mdzod do
T02D2639:241a-36: // bzhi pa ye shes tog ni mdog sngon po
T02D2639:241a-37: g-yas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin
T02D2639:241a-38: // pa'o // nub kyi sgo'i logs su dang po
T02D2639:241a-39: ni 'od dpag tu med pa zla ba'i mdog can
T02D2639:241a-40: phyag g-yas pa na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams pa'o
T02D2639:241a-41: // pa'o // // gnyis pa zla 'od ni mdog
T02D2639:241a-42: dkar po phyag g-yas pa na padma la gnas pa'i
T02D2639:241b-0: gsum pa bzang skyong ni mdog dkar dmar phyag @241b g-yas na rin po che 'bar ba 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2639:241b-1: bzhi pa dra ba can gyi 'od ni mdog dmar
T02D2639:241b-2: po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje'i dra ba 'dzin pa'o
T02D2639:241b-3: // de nas byang gi sgo'i logs su rdo rje
T02D2639:241b-4: snying po mdog sngo zhing dkar ba la phyag g-yas
T02D2639:241b-5: pa na autpa la rdo rje dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2639:241b-6: gnyis pa blo gros mi zad pa ni kunda dang
T02D2639:241b-7: zla ba ltar dkar ba phyag gnyis na ye shes
T02D2639:241b-9: gsum pa spobs pa brtsegs pa ni zangs kyi mdog
T02D2639:241b-10: can phyag gnyis na padma la gnas pa'i rin po
T02D2639:241b-12: bzhi pa kun du bzang po ni mdog ser po
T02D2639:241b-13: phyag g-yas na rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa'o
T02D2639:241b-14: // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni padma dang
T02D2639:241b-15: zla ba'i gdan la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis
T02D2639:241b-16: bzhugs pa g-yon pa khu tshur dkur brten pa'o //
T02D2639:241b-17: dza: yi sa bon las byung ba //
T02D2639:241b-18: shar du rdo rje lcags kyu ni //
T02D2639:241b-19: zla ba dkar ltar mdog 'chang zhing //
T02D2639:241b-21: h'um gi sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02D2639:241b-22: rdo rje zhags pa lho ru ste //
T02D2639:241b-23: sku mdog ser po 'dzin pas gnas //
T02D2639:241b-24: phyag na zhags pa yang dag bsnams //
T02D2639:241b-25: bam gyi sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02D2639:241b-26: rdo rje lcags sgrog nub tu ste //
T02D2639:241b-27: sku mdog dmar po legs par mdzes //
T02D2639:241b-29: ho: yi sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02D2639:241b-30: rdo rje 'bebs pa byang du ste //
T02D2639:241b-31: sna tshogs mdog ni 'dzin pas gnas //
T02D2639:241b-32: phyag na dril bu yang dag bsnams //
T02D2639:241b-33: de ltar dkyil 'khor bskyed nas so so'i sngags brjod par bya ste /
T02D2639:241b-34: chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2639:241b-35: aom na ma: sarba du rga te pa ri sho dha ni r'a dz'a ya /
T02D2639:241b-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas te sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D2639:241b-37: sems ni rnam par g-yeng ba'i rgyur 'gyur bas phyi
T02D2639:241b-38: rol gyi phyag rgya bcing bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs
T02D2639:241b-39: pas dkyil 'khor pa so so'i phyag rgya so sor
T02D2639:241b-40: ma bstan to // sarba bit sarba a'a ba ra na bi sho dha ne mu ne h'um phat /
T02D2639:242a-5: aom sarba bid ma h'a badzrodbha ba d'a na p'a ra mi t'a p'u dze h'um /
T02D2639:242a-7: aom sarba bid ma h'a badzrodbha ba sh'i la p'a ra mi t'a p'u dze tram /
T02D2639:242a-9: aom sarba bid ma h'a badzrodbha ba kshanti p'a ra mi t'a p'u dze hr'i:/
T02D2639:242a-11: aom sarba bid ma h'a badzrodbha ba b'irya p'a ra mi t'a p'u dze aa:/
T02D2639:242a-13: aom sarba bit sarba aa p'a ya bi sho dha
T02D2639:242a-14: ni dha ma dha ma dhu pa ya dhy'a na
T02D2639:242a-15: p'a ra mi t'a p'u dze h'um phat /
T02D2639:242a-17: aom sarba bit sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha
T02D2639:242a-18: ni kle sha tshe nga na pushpa bi lo ka
T02D2639:242a-19: ni pradzny'am p'a ra mi t'a p'u dze tram h'um
T02D2639:242a-21: aom sarba bid aa p'a ya bi sho dha ni
T02D2639:242a-22: dzny'a na a'a lo ka ka ri pra ni dhi
T02D2639:242a-23: na p'a ra mi t'a p'u dze h'um phat /
T02D2639:242a-25: aom sarba bit sarba aa p'a ya gandha ba n'i
T02D2639:242a-26: sha ni badzra gandha au pa ya p'a ra mi
T02D2639:242a-27: t'a p'u dze a'a h'um phat ;
T02D2639:242a-29: aom sarba bid na ra ka ga ti a'a karsha ni h'um dza: phat /
T02D2639:242a-31: aom sarba bit sarba da ra ka autta ra ni h'um h'um phat /
T02D2639:242a-33: aom sarba bit sarba aa p'a ya bandha na bi mo tsa ni h'um bam phat /
T02D2639:242a-35: aom sarba bit sarba aa p'a ya ga ti ga ha na bi sho dha ni h'um ho:phat /
T02D2639:242a-37: aom mee tri ya ha ra n'a sv'a h'a /
T02D2639:242a-38: aom aa mo gh'a darsha ni h'um /
T02D2639:242a-39: aom sarba sho ka ta mo nirga te na ma ti h'um phat /
T02D2639:242a-40: aom sarba aa p'a ya dza ha sarba aa p'a ya bi sho dha ni h'um /
T02D2639:242a-41: aom gandha ha sti ni h'um /
T02D2639:242a-42: aom sh'u ram ga me h'um /
T02D2639:242a-43: aom gha ne ga ga na lo tsa ne h'um /
T02D2639:242a-44: aom dzny'a na ke tu dzny'an ba ti h'um /
T02D2639:242a-45: aom aa mi ta bh'a aa mi ta wa ti h'um /
T02D2639:242a-46: aom tsandre tsandra bya ba lo ki te sv'a h'a /
T02D2639:242a-47: aom bha dra p'a le h'um /
T02D2639:242a-48: aom dz'a la ni ma h'a dz'a la ni h'um /
T02D2639:242a-49: aom badzra garbhe h'um aom aaksha ya karma a'a ba ra na bi sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2639:242a-50: aom sarba pra ti bh'a ne pra ti bh'a na k'u ta sv'a h'a /
T02D2639:242a-51: aom sa manta bha dre h'um /
T02D2639:242a-52: zhes bya ba'i sngags lan re re de dag so sor brjod la /
T02D2639:242a-53: de nas phyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i snying po'i 'od
T02D2639:242a-54: zer lcags kyu'i rnam par yang dag par spros la
T02D2639:242a-55: / shi ba'i rnam par shes pa bkug la 'gro ba rigs drug kyang ngo //
T02D2639:242b-0: yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid du nam mkha' la @242b gnas par bya ste /
T02D2639:242b-1: gos sngon pos mgul chings byas pa'i rdo rje gnod
T02D2639:242b-2: sbyin gyis byin rlabs byas la de nyid kyis sngags
T02D2639:242b-3: bzlas la / mkhas pas rtag tu mchod par bya'o //
T02D2639:242b-4: shi ba'i rus pa'am ming yang rung ste /
T02D2639:242b-5: skyes pa'am bud med gson po gang yang rung se
T02D2639:242b-6: shing ro kha ba la me sbar te phyir bzlog
T02D2639:242b-8: nim pa dang yungs kar bsregs la sngags dang phyag rgyas bsnun par bya'o //
T02D2639:242b-9: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra che ge mo'i sarba p'a pam da ha sv'a h'a /
T02D2639:242b-10: sdig pa thams cad bsreg pa'i sngags des me'i dkyil 'khor du bsnun par bya'o //
T02D2639:242b-11: tshad dang chur ldan pa'i bum pas de'i sdig pa bkru bar bya ste /
T02D2639:242b-12: aom sarba a'a ba ra na da ha na badzra h'um phat /
T02D2639:242b-13: khrus kyi sngags kyis ngan song gi dri ma dag par bya'o //
T02D2639:242b-14: de'i rjes la zan dang chur bsres pas sdig pa zhi bar rab tu brtags la /
T02D2639:242b-15: de nas snod du gyur pa'i dri ma lhag ma
T02D2639:242b-16: gzhom par bya ste de nas phyir bzlog pa bya
T02D2639:242b-18: me tog kundas sgrib pa thams cad dag par bya'o //
T02D2639:242b-19: sngags dang ldan pa'i bla mas phyag rgyas brab par bya'o //
T02D2639:242b-20: de'i rjes la phyir bzlog pa bya ba ni yungs
T02D2639:242b-21: kar gyis bya ste yungs kar me tog dang ldan
T02D2639:242b-22: pas yang dag par brjod cing brab par bya'o //
T02D2639:242b-24: aom sarba p'a pam bi sho dha na badzra h'um phat /
T02D2639:242b-25: aom sarba karma a'a ba ra n'a ni bhasmi ku ru h'um phat /
T02D2639:242b-26: aom brum bi n'a sha ya a'a ba ra n'a ni dza:h'um phat /
T02D2639:242b-27: aom drum bi sho dha ya a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D2639:242b-28: aom dzva la dzva la dha ka dha ka ha
T02D2639:242b-29: na ha na a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat
T02D2639:242b-30: / aom srum sha ra sha ra pra sha ra
T02D2639:242b-31: pra sha ra a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat
T02D2639:242b-32: / / aom h'um ha ra har sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D2639:242b-33: aom bhri ta bhri ta sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D2639:242b-34: aom tra ta tra ta sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D2639:242b-35: aom tshinda tshinda sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D2639:242b-36: aom da ha da ha sarba na ra ga te he tum h'um phat /
T02D2639:242b-37: aom pa tsa pa tsa sarba pre ta ga te he tu na h'um phat //
T02D2639:242b-38: aom mtha ma tha sarba tirya ka ga te he run h'um phat /
T02D2639:242b-39: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis bsnun brab la nam mkha' la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2639:242b-40: de'i rjes la rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i thab khung gi dbus su /
T02D2639:242b-41: h'um las byung ba'i me lha mdog dkar po shes
T02D2639:242b-42: rab la 'khyud pa phyag na ril ba spyi blugs
T02D2639:242b-43: dang mi 'jigs pa dang dbyug pa dang /
T02D2639:243a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bkug nas bsang gtor dang mchod yon dang zhabs bsil phul te /
T02D2639:243a-3: yongs su dag pa'i me la thim par blta'o //
T02D2639:243a-4: sreg rdzas rnams so sor lan bdun phul te dgang blugs dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2639:243a-5: de la nye reg phul te de bzhin nyid kyi
T02D2639:243a-6: ye shes kyi me du yang dag par blta ste
T02D2639:243a-7: / de'i thugs kar ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2639:243a-8: gyi 'khor lo 'khor dang bcas ba bzhugs par bsam
T02D2639:243a-9: / mo // de nas 'khor los sgyur ba nas
T02D2639:243a-10: brtsams te dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi sngags kyis sbyin
T02D2639:243a-11: / mo // sreg dbul lo // de'i rjes su
T02D2639:243a-12: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i yi ge gsum gyis bdag
T02D2639:243a-13: nyid la aom sarba bit sarba aa p'a ya bi
T02D2639:243a-14: sho dha na h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2639:243a-15: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis ngan song rnam par sbyangs
T02D2639:243a-16: la 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkas rdo rje lcags kyu
T02D2639:243a-17: la sogs pa spro ba'i sbyor bas ngan song nas
T02D2639:243a-18: dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang
T02D2639:243a-19: du bya ba la 'gro ba la lam yang dag
T02D2639:243a-20: par bstan pa'i sngags 'di brjod pa nyid kyis bcom
T02D2639:243a-21: ldan 'das kyi zla ba la yi ge gsum gyi
T02D2639:243a-22: bdag nyid bzhugs par bltas te /
T02D2639:243a-23: aom ratne ratne ma h'a ratne ratna sambha be ratna
T02D2639:243a-24: ki ra ne ratna m'a la bi shuddhe sho dha
T02D2639:243a-25: ya sarba p'a pam h'um phat /
T02D2639:243a-26: lam yang dag par bstan pa'i sngags so //
T02D2639:243a-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das la yi ge gsum gyi
T02D2639:243a-28: bdag nyid ro gcig par gyur te spros pa'i sbyor
T02D2639:243a-29: bas rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D2639:243a-30: bcom ldan 'das la dpang bskur ba dang ldan par
T02D2639:243a-31: bltas la dril bu dkrol te dgang gzar mar gyis
T02D2639:243a-32: gang ba dbul bar bya ste /
T02D2639:243a-33: aom padme padme padma audbha be su kha pa tyam gatstshantu sv'a h'a /
T02D2639:243a-34: aom sarba buddha kshe ta gatstshantu sv'a h'a /
T02D2639:243a-35: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dgang blugs dbul lo //
T02D2639:243a-36: nye reg dang so rtsi la sogs pa phul la
T02D2639:243a-37: dkyil 'khor pa rim pas bcom ldan 'das la thim
T02D2639:243a-38: pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang rnam pa thams
T02D2639:243a-39: cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi
T02D2639:243a-40: mtshan nyid du bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D2639:243a-41: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba byas nas dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol bar bya sta [*ste]/
T02D2639:243a-42: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D2639:243a-43: ces bya ba la sogs pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2639:243a-44: de nas nyi ma gsum pa'am bdun pa la snga
T02D2639:243b-0: @243b ma bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms la
T02D2639:243b-1: 'o mas yongs su gang ba'i snod du rus pa
T02D2639:243b-2: thams cad bzhag ste ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags thams
T02D2639:243b-4: yungs kar me tog dkar po dang ldan pas dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2639:243b-5: khrus byas nas kyang ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags mang
T02D2639:243b-6: po bzlas te de nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i bza'
T02D2639:243b-7: ba dang ston mo ji ltar 'dod pa yongs su
T02D2639:243b-8: spyad la shis pa brjod pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2639:243b-10: gang zhig sems can bsam pa'i ngo ru ni //
T02D2639:243b-11: mdo ru yang dag bsdus tsam byas pa la //
T02D2639:243b-12: bstan bcos mthar son mkhas pa yis //
T02D2639:243b-13: bdag la bzod pa mdzad par rigs //
T02D2639:243b-14: bsod nams 'di yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2639:243b-15: khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can kun //
T02D2639:243b-16: nyon mongs rgya mtsho las brgal nas //
T02D2639:243b-17: bde ba can du 'gro bar shog / ngan song
T02D2639:243b-18: thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i cho
T02D2639:243b-19: ga'i bya ba mdor pa sdus pa rdzogs so /
